articles.author: Melissa Rudy
articles.title: Heart attack death risk can double during heat waves and high pollution, study finds: ‘A perfect storm’ - Fox News
articles.description: Some people may have twice the risk of dying from a heart attack amid heat waves and high levels of fine particulate pollution, said an American Heart Association study. A cardiologist weighed in.
articles.content:
Certain groups of people may have twice the risk of dying from a heart attack
 during heat waves and high levels of fine particulate pollution, according to a new study published in Circulation, the… [+5057 chars]

articles.author: AP
articles.title: New Millipede Species Discovered Crawling Under Los Angeles - HuffPost
articles.description: An American metropolis known for freeways and traffic has a newly discovered species named in its honor: The Los Angeles Thread Millipede.
articles.content: This tiny arthropod known as the Los Angeles Thread Millipede is a new species and was found just beneath the surface by graduate students at a hiking area in Southern California, near a freeway, a S… [+3965 chars]
